articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by British Public Figures 
   Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place at the building of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) on May 12 on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the start of leader Kim Jong Il's work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Speakers including the chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said that the Korean people have defended and advanced socialism despite the persistent military threat of the U.S. imperialists, adding that the credit for this entirely goes to Kim Jong Il who has strengthened the WPK into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung, pursuing the Songun politics with the army under his command.    
 They highly praised Kim Jong Il for having performed undying feats in the cause of global independence under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets President of South Korean Red Cross 
   Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Han Wan Sang, president of the south Korean Red Cross, and his party in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday. 
 On hand were Jang Jae On, chairman of the C.C., the DPRK Red Cross Society, and officials concerned.

articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Chief Vice-President of ITF
   Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the ITF the Order of the DPRK National Flag first class was awarded to Ri Ki Ha, chief vice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation. 
 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.    
 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, and others.
